history.proof: intros n. unfold C. qsimpl time: 2. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rinv_r. hauto use: INR_fact_neq_0, Rinv_r_sym, Rmult_1_l, minus_n_O unfold: Rdiv.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of Nat.sub_diag (_ - _)%nat does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Rinv_r (_ * / _) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: intros n. unfold C. rewrite Nat.sub_diag. simpl. rewrite Rinv_r. - ring. - apply INR_fact_neq_0.
